decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 3 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  flank or rear walls of the development hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The outbuilding shall only be used for purposes incidental to the use of the existing house at 849 Great West Road, TW7 5PD and shall not be used as a self-contained residence or for any business purpose.

Condition : 6 - During the construction of the development the footway and carriage way of Great West Road must not be blocked at any time and no vehicles associated with the development must park/load/unload on the pathway/carriage way of Great West Road.
description: Erection of a single storey rear outbuilding for use as a gym room to the house
